A4.text: On 23 January 1719, after the lands had been purchased, Charles VI, Holy Roman Emperor, decreed that Vaduz and Schellenberg were united and elevated the newly formed territory to the dignity of Reichsf√ºrstentum (imperial principality) with the name 'Liechtenstein'
